Class GamePiece

java.lang.Object
  GamePiece
Direct Known Subclasses:
CrackedIce, FishingHole, Penguin, Seal, Skua
public class GamePiece
extends Object

An entity in the game represented by an image.
Game pieces are added to the game and interact by colliding with each other..

Version:
5, June 13 2014
Author:
Xin Hao Zhang

Field Summary
(package private)  BufferedImage img
          (Reference) Represents the game piece's image sprite to draw on the game board.

Constructor Detail

GamePiece

public GamePiece(int x,
                 int y,
                 int width,
                 int height,
                 String fileName)
Constructor initializes the coordinates of the game piece and loads the sprite.
try catch block attempts to read the image associated with the GamePiece.

Parameters:
x - The x coordinate of the game piece.
y - The y coordinate of the game piece.
fileName - (String) the file name of the game piece's sprite image.
e - The type of exception that occured.

getBounds

public Shape getBounds()
Returns a Shape (Ellipse) representation of the GamePiece using it's xy coordinates and dimensions. Used for collision detection.
